definitions.definition: Any of various edible fungi , of the genus Tuber , that grow in the soil in southern Europe ; the earthnut .
Ellipsis of chocolate truffle ( “ creamy chocolate confection , in the form of a ball, covered with cocoa powder ” ) .

main_definition: Any of various edible fungi , of the genus Tuber , that grow in the soil in southern Europe ; the earthnut .
secondary_definitions: ( by analogy ) Ellipsis of chocolate truffle ( “ creamy chocolate confection , in the form of a ball, covered with cocoa powder ” ) .
